content.question: Let <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="y"><semantics><mi>y</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> be positive constants. Which of the following is equivalent to <math alttext="2 ln x minus 3 ln y"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>ln</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>y</mi></mpadded></mpadded></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="ln open parentheses x squared over y cubed close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="ln open parentheses x squared y cubed close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="ln open parentheses 2 x minus 3 y close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="ln open parentheses fraction numerator 2 x over denominator 3 y end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="ln open parentheses x squared over y cubed close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
